overview: The son of the inventor of a matter-transporter, which turned him into a monster when he tried to transport himself along with a tiny housefly, continues to pursue his father's experiment, while his own two sons attempt to extricate him, themselves and the family name from further disaster and scandal.
tagline: Piece by Piece...Atom by Atom...Humans Invisibly Teleported Through Time and Space!!!
title: Curse of the Fly
